item.title: Ardi Client Anti-Leach Help
item.dc:creator: @thejoshpro thejoshpro
item.description:
@thejoshpro wrote:

I know this may look stupid because there is an anti-leach read me in the download saying how to remove it, but i have done what it says and im getting errors.

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/547434-pi-ardi-revolutionary-version-2-0-release.html

Client Sided
Uncomment out the client() in Client.java
Uncomment out the findcachedir() in signlink.java
Uncomment out the String cacheLink in CacheDownloader.java

Client.java
Before -
[SPOILER] /client() {
revision474 = true;
OSOrbs = true;
xpAddedPos = expAdded = 0;
xpLock = false;
xpCounter = 0;
setFormat(new DecimalFormat());
chatRights = new int[500];
fullscreenInterfaceID = -1;

[SPOILER]
/public static String findcachedir() {
String as[] = { System.getProperty(“user.home”) + “/” };
String s = “ArdiRSPS”;
for (int i = 0; i < as.length; i++)
try {
String s1 = as[i];
if (s1.length() > 0) {
File file = new File(s1);
if (!file.exists())
continue;
}
File file1 = new File(s1 + s);
if (file1.exists() || file1.mkdir())
return s1 + s + “/”;
} catch (Exception _ex) {
}
return null;
}/ [/SPOILER]
